channel.title: Really laggy?
channel.description: okay so i downloaded tis server and client rune-evolution and it is jsut so laggy i cant really even walk without it freezing anyone know a fix i have already tryed different clients!

item.title: Really laggy?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

littlehager1:

okay so i downloaded tis server and client rune-evolution and it is jsut so laggy i cant really even walk without it freezing anyone know a fix i have already tryed different clients!

You canâ€™t fix the lag by getting a new client or that. Rune-Evo, and any 66X+ servers (Rune evo is a 721+) take a lot of RAM and processing power. So hosting it on your machine is a bad idea unless you have a really good computer.
